name: Amexio Social
description: this component is use for facebook oauth login

properties.name: api-key
properties.description: user api key which is generate on facebook developer webside

properties.name: type
properties.description: type attribute  have multiple option like google,linkedin,facebook support

properties.name: style-type
properties.description: set the style type like circle,square

events.name: onLogin
events.description: event is fired when user loggedin successfully.
